panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query for the given time.
panels.title: Requests Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the the total number of handled requests against /query.
panels.title: Requests Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests.
panels.title: Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query_range for the given time range.
panels.title: Requests Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the the total number of handled requests against /query_range.
panels.title: Requests Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests.
panels.title: Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.
panels.title: gPRC (Unary) Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.
panels.title: gPRC (Unary) Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers.
panels.title: gRPC Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.
panels.title: gPRC (Unary) Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.
panels.title: gPRC (Unary) Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.
panels.title: gPRC (Unary) Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of incoming requests.
panels.title: Incoming Requests Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled incoming requests.
panels.title: Incoming Requests Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle incoming requests.
panels.title: Incoming Requests Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of alerts that successfully sent to alert manager.
panels.title: Alert Sent Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of sent alerts.
panels.title: Alert Sent Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to send alerts to alert manager.
panels.title: Alert Sent Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of execution for compactions against blocks that are stored in the bucket by compaction group.
panels.title: Compaction Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of executed compactions against blocks that are stored in the bucket.
panels.title: Compaction Errors
